card.name: A Display of My Dark Power
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What would you say is my greatest attribute? Is it my gluttonous lust for power?"

card.name: All in Good Time
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, take an extra turn after this one. Schemes can't be set in motion that turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take a moment. Ponder the depths of your insignificance."

card.name: All Shall Smolder in My Wake
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's my goal to find the melting point of every substance."

card.name: Approach My Molten Realm
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, if a source would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a dragon-infested lavascape of notorious peril. Make yourselves at home."

card.name: Behold the Power of Destruction
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy all nonland permanents target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd call that a successful first test. Golem! Rearm the Doom Citadel!"

card.name: Choose Your Champion
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a player. Until your next turn, only you and the chosen player can cast spells and attack with creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It seems the fate of the world rests on your shoulders, feeble child."

card.name: Dance, Pathetic Marionette
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. Choose one of the revealed creature cards and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put all other cards revealed this way into their owners' graveyards.

card.name: Embrace My Diabolical Vision
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You draw seven cards, then each other player draws four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My vision is for the good of everyone. Mostly me."

card.name: Every Hope Shall Vanish
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card from each of those hands. Those players discard those cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, I think I will get away with this."

card.name: Every Last Vestige Shall Rot
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, put each nonland permanent target player controls with converted mana cost X or less on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Evil Comes to Fruition
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, create seven 0/1 green Plant creature tokens. If you control ten or more lands, create seven 3/3 green Elemental creature tokens instead.

card.name: Feed the Machine
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, the player sacrifices two creatures. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even you have a purpose. Your blood will oil the gears."

card.name: I Bask in Your Silent Awe
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Each opponent can't cast more than one spell each turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, if no opponent cast a spell since your last turn ended, abandon this scheme.

card.name: I Call on the Ancient Magics
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each other player searches their library for a card, reveals it, and puts it into their hand. Then you search your library for two cards and put them into your hand. Each player shuffles their library.

card.name: I Delight in Your Convulsions
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't imagine what you're feeling right now, but I'll try my best."

card.name: I Know All, I See All
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step. At the beginning of each end step, if three or more cards were put into your graveyard this turn from anywhere, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Ignite the Cloneforge!
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, create a token that's a copy of target permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Into the Earthen Maw
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may even see them again. Full digestion takes three hundred years."

card.name: Introductions Are in Order
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, choose one — • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. • You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Meet my newest minion. Come now, don't be shy—shake her pincer."

card.name: Know Naught but Fire
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cranial explosions for everyone. Still planning to outthink my dragons?"

card.name: Look Skyward and Despair
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today I take the reins of destiny itself. Today the Draconic Apocalypse is upon you."

card.name: May Civilization Collapse
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, that player sacrifices two lands. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This should halt the spread of your insolence."

card.name: Mortal Flesh Is Weak
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent's life total becomes the lowest life total among your opponents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I certainly would have accepted my offer of eternal life. But if you choose death instead, who am I to argue?"

card.name: My Crushing Masterstroke
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of all nonland permanents your opponents control until end of turn. Untap those permanents. They gain haste until end of turn. Each of them attacks its owner this turn if able.

card.name: My Genius Knows No Bounds
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can see . . . everything. The beginning and the end of time. The raw edges of reality. And now I see exactly how to kill you."

card.name: My Undead Horde Awakens
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) At the beginning of your end step, you may put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When a creature put onto the battlefield with this scheme dies, abandon this scheme.

card.name: My Wish Is Your Command
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a noncreature, nonland card revealed this way and cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Indulge me. Just one spell. One potentially fatal spell gone horribly awry."

card.name: Nature Demands an Offering
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a creature you don't control and puts it on top of its owner's library, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land. Then the owner of each permanent chosen this way shuffles their library.

card.name: Nature Shields Its Own
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked, if you're the defending player, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token that's blocking that creature. When four or more creatures attack you, abandon this scheme at end of combat.

card.name: Nothing Can Stop Me Now
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) If a source an opponent controls would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage. At the beginning of each end step, if you've been dealt 5 or more damage this turn, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Only Blood Ends Your Nightmares
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Then each opponent who didn't sacrifice a creature discards two cards.

card.name: Realms Befitting My Majesty
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look around you. All you behold is mine to rule. It's the natural way."

card.name: Roots of All Evil
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, create five 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I assure you, these are not the kind that thrive on sunlight and water."

card.name: Rotted Ones, Lay Siege
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't come back until you've got brains in your teeth."

card.name: Surrender Your Thoughts
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, that player discards four cards. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents discards two cards.

card.name: The Dead Shall Serve
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Each of those creatures attacks its owner each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell your old master I said hello."

card.name: The Fate of the Flammable
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, this scheme deals 6 damage to that player. If the player chooses others, this scheme deals 3 damage to each of your other opponents.

card.name: The Iron Guardian Stirs
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 4/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It would be disappointing if you were unable to overcome this simplest of defenses. Hilarious, but disappointing."

card.name: The Pieces Are Coming Together
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. Artifact spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: The Very Soil Shall Shake
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample. When a creature you control dies, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Tooth, Claw, and Tail
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to three target nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Silence your wailing. This is but a taste of the destruction my pets have in store."

card.name: Which of You Burns Brightest?
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, this scheme deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let that be a lesson to you, your family, and everyone you've ever known."

card.name: Your Fate Is Thrice Sealed
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't abide laziness. Arise, forces of nature, and serve your master!"

card.name: Your Puny Minds Cannot Fathom
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, draw four cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen far beyond this imperfect world, into a tomorrow that doesn't include you."

card.name: Your Will Is Not Your Own
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +3/+3 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fool. I'll show you how to use that thing."

card.name: Leonin Abunas
card.property: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.

card.name: Metallurgeon
card.property: {W}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time I got there, the heart had stopped. Fortunately, I was able to replace it with something better."

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Path to Exile
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Sanctum Gargoyle
card.property: Flying When Sanctum Gargoyle enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As their supplies of etherium dwindled, mechanists sent gargoyles farther and farther afield in search of salvage.

card.name: March of the Machines
card.property: Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)

card.name: Master Transmuter
card.property: {U}, {T}, Return an artifact you control to its owner's hand: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wasted potential surrounds us. Lend me that bauble, and let me see what it can be made to be."

card.name: Spin into Myth
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library, then fateseal 2. (To fateseal 2, look at the top two cards of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.property: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Beacon of Unrest
card.property: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

card.name: Bog Witch
card.property: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Add {B}{B}{B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The world is the body. The mana is the blood. The witch is the surgeon.

card.name: Cemetery Reaper
card.property: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Corpse Connoisseur
card.property: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Dregscape Zombie
card.property: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

card.name: Extractor Demon
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Festering Goblin
card.property: When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, it was a fetid, disease-ridden thing. In death, not much changed.

card.name: Incremental Blight
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shadowmoor's main crops are rot, slime, and despair.

card.name: Infectious Horror
card.property: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

card.name: Infest
card.property: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather." —Rannon, Vithian holdout

card.name: Makeshift Mannequin
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a mannequin counter on it. For as long as that creature has a mannequin counter on it, it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This vulgar mimicry will end now." —Desmera, perfect of Wren's Run

card.name: Reanimate
card.property: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though you may see the same bones, you'll never see the same skeleton twice.

card.name: Scion of Darkness
card.property: Trample Whenever Scion of Darkness deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Shriekmaw
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

card.name: Sign in Blood
card.property: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know I accept only one currency here, and yet you have sought me out. Why now do you hesitate?" —Xathrid demon

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Urborg Syphon-Mage
card.property: {2} {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Each other player loses 2 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have become a gourmet of sorts. Each soul has its own distinctive flavor. The art is in inviting the right company to the feast."

card.name: Zombie Infestation
card.property: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

card.name: Zombify
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first birth celebrates life. The second birth mocks it." —Mystic elder

card.name: Battering Craghorn
card.property: First strike Morph {1}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their skeletons can be found all over Skirk Ridge, tangled in each other's horns.

card.name: Breath of Darigaaz
card.property: Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.) Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.property: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long." —Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Dragon Breath
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When a creature with converted mana cost 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Dragon Fodder
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

card.name: Dragon Whelp
card.property: Flying {R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
card.property: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."

card.name: Fireball
card.property: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

card.name: Flameblast Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragon lords of Jund rule by edicts of flame.

card.name: Furnace Whelp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

card.name: Gathan Raiders
card.property: Hellbent — Gathan Raiders gets +2/+2 as long as you have no cards in hand. Morph—Discard a card. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Hellkite Charger
card.property: Flying, haste Whenever Hellkite Charger attacks, you may pay {5}{R}{R}. If you do, untap all attacking creatures and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Imperial Hellkite
card.property: Flying Morph {6}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Imperial Hellkite is turned face up, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Inferno Trap
card.property: If you've been dealt damage by two or more creatures this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Inferno Trap deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Kilnmouth Dragon
card.property: Amplify 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it for each Dragon card you reveal in your hand.) Flying {T}: Kilnmouth Dragon deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to any target.

card.name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
card.property: Flying When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Seething Song
card.property: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vulshok mana rituals echo the day when the red sun burst through Mirrodin's surface to take its place in the heavens.

card.name: Skirk Commando
card.property: Whenever Skirk Commando deals combat damage to a player, you may have it deal 2 damage to target creature that player controls. Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Skirk Marauder
card.property: Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Skirk Marauder is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Taurean Mauler
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of a waterfall. The fury of an avalanche. The intellect of a gale-force wind.

card.name: Two-Headed Dragon
card.property: Flying Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature each combat. {1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Volcanic Fallout
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can we outrun the sky?" —Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

card.name: Chameleon Colossus
card.property: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Protection from black {2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Feral Hydra
card.property: Feral Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Feral Hydra. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.

card.name: Fertilid
card.property: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles their library.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.property: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fog
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else." —Lord Hilneth

card.name: Forgotten Ancient
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

card.name: Gleeful Sabotage
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Harmonize
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

card.name: Hunting Moa
card.property: Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Hunting Moa enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Kamahl, Fist of Krosa
card.property: {G}: Target land becomes a 1/1 creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {2}{G}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My mind has changed. My strength has not."

card.name: Krosan Tusker
card.property: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. (Do this before you draw.)

card.name: Leaf Gilder
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eidren, perfect of Lys Alana, ordered hundreds of trees uprooted and rearranged into a pattern he deemed beautiful. Thus the Gilt-Leaf Wood was born.

card.name: Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My mind is the spread of the canopy. My heart is the embrace of the roots. I am deathless Llanowar, its fury and its peace."

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You are the grandest of all," said the archdruid to the trees. They became so proud of bark and branch that they suffered no creature to fly overhead or perch upon a bough.

card.name: Primal Command
card.property: Choose two — • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rancor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample. When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
card.property: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slain orochi warriors were buried with a tree sapling so they would become a part of the forest after death.

card.name: Shinen of Life's Roar
card.property: All creatures able to block Shinen of Life's Roar do so. Channel — {2}{G}{G}, Discard Shinen of Life's Roar: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

card.name: Spider Umbra
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

card.name: Thelonite Hermit
card.property: Saproling creatures get +1/+1. Morph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Thelonite Hermit is turned face up, create four 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

card.name: Verdeloth the Ancient
card.property: Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.) Saproling creatures and other Treefolk creatures get +1/+1. When Verdeloth the Ancient enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

card.name: Wall of Roots
card.property: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.

card.name: Wickerbough Elder
card.property: Wickerbough Elder enters the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it. {G}, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Wickerbough Elder: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Living scarecrows make a mockery of the natural order. Dead ones make fine hats."

card.name: Yavimaya Dryad
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.) When Yavimaya Dryad enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped under target player's control. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The parched earth still shielded those few souls with the heart to call it home.

card.name: Agony Warp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

card.name: Architects of Will
card.property: When Architects of Will enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. Cycling {U/B} ({U/B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This secret society of mages manipulates the beliefs and opinions of others.

card.name: Armadillo Cloak
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Avatar of Discord
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) Flying When Avatar of Discord enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Such is the power of Rakdos that even his shadow takes on a cruel life of its own.

card.name: Batwing Brume
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn if {W} was spent to cast Batwing Brume. Each player loses 1 life for each attacking creature they control if {B} was spent to cast Batwing Brume. (Do both if {W}{B} was spent.)

card.name: Bituminous Blast
card.property: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Bituminous Blast deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Branching Bolt
card.property: Choose one or both — • Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature with flying. • Branching Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lightning lives in everything, in living flesh and growing things. It must be set free." —Rakka Mar

card.name: Colossal Might
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never corner a barbarian. You become the path of least resistance." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Ethersworn Shieldmage
card.property: Flash When Ethersworn Shieldmage enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to artifact creatures this turn.

card.name: Fieldmist Borderpost
card.property: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fieldmist Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Fires of Yavimaya
card.property: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Heroes' Reunion
card.property: Target player gains 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You helped save my people from a Phyrexian fate. Did you think I wouldn't return the favor?" —Eladamri, to Gerrard

card.name: Kaervek the Merciless
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, Kaervek the Merciless deals damage to any target equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rats and jackals feast in his swath, but even they will not walk with him." —Mangara

card.name: Magister Sphinx
card.property: Flying When Magister Sphinx enters the battlefield, target player's life total becomes 10.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These benighted worlds are thick with ignorance. I will educate them. They will listen, or they will die."

card.name: Mistvein Borderpost
card.property: You may pay {1} and return a basic land you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Mistvein Borderpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Pale Recluse
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Forestcycling {2}, plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Rakdos Guildmage
card.property: ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.) {3}{B}, Discard a card: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. {3}{R}: Create a 2/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Savage Twister
card.property: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is the ultimate mindless destroyer, capable of power and ferocity no army can match, and the Gruul follow its example." —Trigori, Azorius senator

card.name: Selesnya Guildmage
Terminate
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen death before. My mother succumbing to illness, my comrades bleeding on the battlefield . . . But I'd never seen anything as dreadful as that." —Taani, berserker of Etlan

card.name: Torrent of Souls
card.property: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

card.name: Unbender Tine
card.property: {T}: Untap another target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creations made in madness may contain great power. The path to that power is as labyrinthine as the creator's mind.

card.name: Unmake
card.property: Exile target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A gwyllion's favorite trap is the vanity mirror. A bewitched piece of glass traps the looker's soul and does away with the body.

card.name: Vampiric Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vampiric Dragon this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampiric Dragon. {1}{R}: Vampiric Dragon deals 1 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only in Ravnica do the wolves watch the flock.

card.name: Wax // Wane

alternate.name: Wax
alternate.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Aether Spellbomb
card.property: {U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Release that which was never caged." —Spellbomb inscription

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

card.name: Dreamstone Hedron
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

card.name: Duplicant
card.property: Imprint — When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

card.name: Everflowing Chalice
card.property: Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked. {T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

card.name: Juggernaut
card.property: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Built with neither a way to steer nor a way to stop, the juggernauts were simply aimed at an enemy's best defenses and told to charge.

card.name: Lightning Greaves
card.property: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

card.name: Lodestone Golem
card.property: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Somehow it warps the Æther. It brings a strange weight, a blockade in the flow of spellcraft." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Memnarch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the blur between metal and flesh, Memnarch found madness.

card.name: Obelisk of Esper
card.property: {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is a monument as austere, unyielding, and inscrutable as Esper itself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

card.name: Skullcage
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Skullcage deals 2 damage to that player unless they have exactly three or exactly four cards in hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a focused mind can survive it.

card.name: Sorcerer's Strongbox
card.property: {2}, {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, sacrifice Sorcerer's Strongbox and draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simun the Quiet filled the chest with his most precious thoughts. But in a fit of paranoia, he locked up the memory of where he hid the key.

card.name: Sun Droplet
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many charge counters on Sun Droplet. At the beginning of each upkeep, you may remove a charge counter from Sun Droplet. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sundering Titan
card.property: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

card.name: Synod Centurion
card.property: When you control no other artifacts, sacrifice Synod Centurion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We order them to stand, they stand. We order them to wait, they wait. We order them to die, they die." —Pontifex, elder researcher

card.name: Synod Sanctum
card.property: {2}, {T}: Exile target permanent you control. {2}, Sacrifice Synod Sanctum: Return all cards exiled with Synod Sanctum to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Thran Dynamo
card.property: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.

card.name: Thunderstaff
card.property: As long as Thunderstaff is untapped, if a creature would deal combat damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage. {2}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Artisan of Kozilek
card.property: When you cast this spell, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

card.name: Barren Moor
card.property: Barren Moor enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Graypelt Refuge
card.property: Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Kazandu Refuge
card.property: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Khalni Garden
card.property: Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped. When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Krosan Verge
card.property: Krosan Verge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Llanowar Reborn
card.property: Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

card.name: Mosswort Bridge
card.property: Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {G}. {G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

card.name: Nantuko Monastery
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. Threshold — {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white Insect Monk creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Rakdos Carnarium
card.property: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

card.name: Secluded Steppe
card.property: Secluded Steppe enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}. Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Terramorphic Expanse
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tranquil Thicket
card.property: Tranquil Thicket enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. Cycling {G} ({G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Vitu-Ghazi, the City-Tree
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the autumn, she casts her seeds across the streets below, and come spring, her children rise in service to the Conclave.
